title: 3 Bed Room House Sale in Ampitiya
details:
A new house in a scenic area . Ground floor completed house and structure for 3 stories.
The house is located on the amipitiya-kandy main road, 4km to the kandy city.
Close to leading schools in Kandy.
3 Bedrooms
2 Bathrooms
Servant room with attached bathroom
Price Negotiable
